2022-06-25 DATLAS · WEB

The 2022 annual meeting took place in Grenoble

Stephanie and Laurent have participated in the annual meeting of project SASIP, taking place in Grenoble, 20-23 June 2022.

3 days of inspiring science talks and discussions about sea ice modeling with 55 participants of 7 countries (France, US, New Zeland, UK, Norway, Germany, Canada) from the 13 institutions of the SASIP consortium.

Check out the SASIP website.


About

Datlas was created in 2021 by a team of scientists experts in numerical modeling and numerical methods in Earth and Environmental sciences. More ›
